key_risks: Legal and regulatory risks related to privacy concerns and dealer compliance
Economic sensitivity due to reliance on the automotive retail market
Intense competitive pressures from rivals like Autotrader and CarGurus
Dependence on dealership partnerships for revenue and operations
controversies: Class action lawsuit alleging violations of California's privacy law
Better Business Bureau concerns about misleading pricing and undisclosed fees
social_issues: Consumer trust issues due to mixed reviews and allegations of misleading practices
Data privacy and security concerns related to user data collection
governance_issues: Potential governance challenges tied to dealer misconduct and compliance risks
